entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers and drizzle ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
